import React, { Component } from 'react' class Profile extends Component { render() { let data = this.props.data; let followers = `${data.htmlUrl}?tab=followers`; let following = `${data.htmlUrl}?tab=following`; let repos = `${data.htmlUrl}?tab=repositories`; return (

{data.name || data.username}
